text: Dan Evans was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Lu Yen-hsun won the title after defeating Tatsuma Ito 6–1, 7–6(7–4) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Santaizi ATP Challenger - Singles 2017 Singles Category:2017 in Taiwanese sport
title: 2017 Santaizi ATP Challenger – Singles
